name: Akureyri Swimming Pool
description: This is one of Akureyri's most popular attractions, open all year round and heated by natural geothermal water. The facility includes two 25-meter outdoor pools, water slides, hot tubs, a cold tub, an indoor pool, and a steam bath. It is a well-maintained space for both relaxation and fun, catering to the strong Icelandic social swimming culture.

opening_hours.note: Hours are seasonal; check the official website for the exact current schedule.
